attributes.action: Social and financial benefits should be effective immediately and not in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the years many old age pensioners die before receiving benefits which they fought for.The promise of what may be in the future is small comfort to the aged when told that MPs.and Ministers have immediate pay rises and we have to wait 'til when ever because the Gvt. can not (or will not) afford
the cost.Is it because of other commitments elseware abroad?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
